participant_1.background:
I want a home that is quiet and private, with plenty of space for my vintage cars.
i work as a physical therapist , and my wife is a school nurse.
i currently work at target.
i likw to go to the farmers markets to buy local veggies and fruits.
My family is my everything, and I want to find someone who is willing to share that with me.

participant_2.background:
I eat healthy and exercise regularly to keep my body and mind young.
I am a single lady who loves chai tea and knitting.
I'm proud of my ability to make the most of Halloween and enjoy it in my own way.
I collect guitar picks and guitar strings to use in my music.
I don't need to dress up to impress my husband because he loves me for who I am.

content.text: Hello there!  How's your day going?
It's going well!  I'm about to go for a walk in the park.
That sounds nice.  I love taking walks in the park.
Me too.  It's a great way to get some exercise and enjoy the fresh air.
Exactly.  I also love listening to the birds sing.
Yes, the birdsong is so relaxing.  I also love looking at the flowers.
The flowers are beautiful this time of year.  I'm glad the weather is finally getting nice.
Me too.  It's been a long winter.
It sure has.  But now we can enjoy the outdoors again.
Yes, we can.  And I'm planning to do a lot of it!
Me too!  I'm excited for the summer.
Me too!  It's going to be a great one.
